letters.description: Assess the client's current energetic frequency and identify areas of physical or emotional disharmony.
Collaboratively define the specific healing objective or emotional breakthrough desired for the session.
Utilize gentle acoustic tools to transition the client from active beta brainwaves into a receptive meditative state.
Apply targeted harmonic vibrations to break up energetic stagnation and physical tension within the body.
Facilitate a deep parasympathetic response to calm the nervous system and promote cellular-level repair.
Sweep the subtle energy field with high-frequency instruments to clear lingering blockages and balance chakras.
Guide the client through the processing and letting go of stored emotional or somatic trauma triggered by the sound.
Incorporate low-frequency sounds and sensory awareness to anchor the transformation into the physical body and daily reality.
